17 #include "Sensor.hpp"

20  *
21  */
22 class MMA8452 : public Sensor {
23 public:
24  MMA8452();
25 
26 
27  enum orientation {
28  ORIENT_PORTRAIT_UP,
29  ORIENT_PORTRAIT_DOWN,
30  ORIENT_LANDSCAPE_LEFT,
31  ORIENT_LANDSCAPE_RIGHT,
32  ORIENT_FLAT_UP,
33  ORIENT_FLAT_DOWN,
34  ORIENT_ERROR
35  };
36 
37 
38 
39  inline int16_t x() const { return x_; };
40  inline int16_t y() const { return y_; };
41  inline int16_t z() const { return z_; };
42 
43  int sample(void);
44 
45  enum orientation orient();
46 
47  int enable(bool value = true);
48  inline int disable(){ return enable(false); }
49 
50 
51 
52  typedef struct {
53  uint16_t data_rate;
54  uint32_t auto_wake_rate;
55  uint32_t flags;
56 
57  } mma8452_attr_t;
58 
59 
60  int setattr();
61 
62 
63  //Free Fall API
64  int ff_enable(uint8_t cfg, uint8_t src, uint8_t threshold, uint8_t count);
65  int ff_disable();
66 
67  //Orientation API
68  int pl_enable(uint8_t threshold = 0,
69  uint8_t hyst = 4,
70  uint8_t count = 128,
71  uint8_t back_front_trip_angle = 0,
72  uint8_t zlock = 0);
73  int pl_disable();
74 
75  //Transient API
76  int transient_enable(uint8_t cfg, uint8_t src, uint8_t threshold, uint8_t count);
77  int transient_disable();
78 
79 
80  //Pulse API
81  enum pulse_list {
82  PULSE_X_SINGLE = (1<<0),
83  PULSE_X_DOUBLE = (1<<1),
84  PULSE_Y_SINGLE = (1<<2),
85  PULSE_Y_DOUBLE = (1<<3),
86  PULSE_Z_SINGLE = (1<<4),
87  PULSE_Z_DOUBLE = (1<<5)
88  };
89  //Pulse are for detecting tapping/flicking etc
90  int pulse_enable(uint8_t cfg ,
91  uint8_t threshold_x = 32,
92  uint8_t threshold_y = 32,
93  uint8_t threshold_z = 32,
94  uint8_t limit = 100,
95  uint8_t latency = 80,
96  uint8_t window = 1);
97  int pulse_disable();
98 
99  enum pulse {
100  PULSE_X_POS = (1<<0),
101  PULSE_X_NEG = (1<<1),
102  PULSE_Y_POS = (1<<2),
103  PULSE_Y_NEG = (1<<3),
104  PULSE_Z_POS = (1<<4),
105  PULSE_Z_NEG = (1<<5)
106  };
107 
108  uint8_t pulse();
109 
110 
111  //Interrupt API
112 
113  enum intr_list {
114  INTR_SLEEP_WAKE = (1<<7),
115  INTR_TRANSIENT = (1<<5),
116  INTR_PL = (1<<4),
117  INTR_PULSE = (1<<3),
118  INTR_FF = (1<<2),
119  INTR_DATA_READY = (1<<0)
120  };
121 
122  enum intr_wake {
123  INTR_WAKE_FIFO_GATE = (1<<7),
124  INTR_WAKE_TRANSIENT = (1<<6),
125  INTR_WAKE_PL = (1<<5),
126  INTR_WAKE_PULSE = (1<<4),
127  INTR_WAKE_FF = (1<<3)
128  };
129 
130 
131  int intr_enable(uint8_t en ,
132  uint8_t cfg = 0,
133  bool open_drain = true,
134  bool active_high = true,
135  uint8_t wake = 0
136  );
137 
138 
139  inline int addr() const { return SLAVE_ADDR; }
140  inline int who_am_i_loc() const { return offsetof(mma8452_t, who_am_i); }
141 
142 private:
143 
144  enum {
145  SLAVE_ADDR = 0x1C
146  };
147 
148  int set_bit(int loc, int bit, bool value = true);
149  inline int clear_bit(int loc, int bit){
150  return set_bit(loc, bit, false);
151  }
152 
153  int16_t x_, y_, z_;
154 
155 };
